summary: This re-texture gives all the even items a darker more sinister look.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a79/preamp/SE_zps8ff2a341.jpg[/img]
About :
I have always disliked the colors of the elven items in skyrim, so decided to give them a more sinister look.

All the elven items have been re-colored with a darker more sinister tone.

This is a cosmetic change only!


Install:
Just extract the files into your Skyrim folder.

Uninstall : 
Remove following files

skyrim\\data\\textures\\armor\\elven\\f\\cuirass.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\boots_d.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\cuirass_d.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\gauntlets_d.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\battleaxe\\elvenbattleaxe.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\bow\\bow.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\dagger\\dagger_d.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\greatsword\\greatsword_d.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\handaxe\\handaxe.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\mace\\mace.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\scabbard\\scabbard.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\shield\\elvenshield_d.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\sword\\sword_d.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\warhammer\\elvenwarhammer.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\arrow\\quiver.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\arrow\\quiver_m.dds
skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\elven\\arrow\\quiver_b.dds


Changelog :
v.1 initial release.
v.1.1 Added missing quiver texture.

[b]
Note : 
The Screenshots was taken using UNP Female Armors by Exeter and
Nordic Seasons ENB by samnilsen

!!!! Depending on your lighting settings this texture can seem very dark! i recommend a ENB preset that turns up the lighting a bit !!! 
[/b]
